TextBlock.Text: OKALIS: Friends, I have spectacular news! Amylax has informed me there is a mysterious signal reverberating throughout the <color=orange>Feedback Chamber</color>, which arrived shortly before we did. I am certain it must be the signal from the <color=orange>Eye</color>!

AZOLLA: Okalis, consider what you are saying for a moment. It seems highly implausible that the <color=orange>Eye’s</color> signal penetrated into the <color=purple>Deep Bramble</color>, and then became trapped in a particular area. How would that even occur?

OKALIS: I know that it seems implausible, but so does a signal older than the universe! It is what our clan risked everything to find in the first place. We would be disrespecting their sacrifice if we sit idle while a mysterious signal is well within our grasp!
OKALIS: Please, look at yourselves. We are Nomai. We are meant to make discoveries, but we have been entirely idle for entirely too long. We need this.
NESIA: …You’re correct, Okalis. As wounded as we may be, stagnating here will do us no good. Our friends would not have wanted us to stay here forever, refusing to move on.
AZOLLA: Fair points, both of you. Alright, we will investigate this mysterious signal, but only if we unanimously agree to do so, understood?
SENNETTI: With how our luck has been lately, Okalis, I have some trouble believing that.
SENNETTI: It will certainly be a risk, but I agree we should at least perform a cursory investigation.
OKALIS: Understood. Naturally, I agree we should investigate.
